embed.description: **Horde Bell** is the second Challenge Bell that the player may choose after defeating the **Frost Guardian** with the **Dread Bell** active

fields.name: Effects
fields.value: Reduced enemy wave counter, but you start with a **Crown**. Enemies will appear every 4 rounds instead of 5. Your pet will have a **Crown** at the start of the run.

embed.title: Horde Bell
